thread.title: Glenn Langford

author: Glenn Langford
title: Glenn Langford
text:
Steve H. and his work colleague turned up well within the timeframe, in two vans. These two have obviously worked together for some time as there was quite a lot of humorous banter between them which I liked. Anyhow, working as a team, they got my two tyres replaced swiftly, and Steve let me know additionaly that my rear brake pads would need replacing soon which was a nice touch.
A great team, great service and at a great price. Thanks T.O.T.D. I would have no qualms in recommending you.
Glenn Langford
